content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5) - working (water: 99.95, temp: 15°C)
- Boiler (position: -6.0, 1.5) - 11 coal remaining (water: 200.0, steam: 199.95)
- Steam engine (position: -1.5, 4.5) - working (steam: 199.99)
- Connected pipe network (3 pipes from pump to boiler, 4 pipes from boiler to engine)

### Iron Production Line at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5) - chest full warning (63 iron ore in output)
- Wooden chest (position: 15.5, 72.5) - contains 63 iron ore (full)
- Inserter (position: 16.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items
- Stone furnace (position: 16.0, 74.0) - contains 72 iron plates
- Inserter (position: 17.5, 74.5) - output blocked warning
- Inserter (position: 18.5, 74.5) - waiting for source items
- Assembling machine 2 (position: 21.5, 74.5) - missing iron plates for gear production
- Output chest (position: 19.5, 74.5) - empty
- Small electric poles providing full power coverage

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent placement errors (5 new instances)
- Invalid entity/prototype arguments: Always pass valid Entity or Prototype objects (occurred 2 times)
- Placement in occupied tiles: Check for existing entities before placing (occurred at (20.5,74.5) and (148.5,150.5))
- Placement in water: Verify terrain is buildable (occurred at (148.5,150.5))
- Distance too far: Move within 10 tiles before placing (distance was 74.35 tiles for inserter at (16.5,72.5))

### Production chain issues
- Iron ore backlog: Chest at (15.5,72.5) full with 63 ore - clear to resume mining
- Assembler starvation: No iron plates reaching assembler at (21.5,74.5)
- Inserter blockage: Output path blocked for inserter at (17.5,74.5)
- Resource imbalance: 72 iron plates accumulated in furnace not being utilized

### Power management
- Boiler fuel monitoring: 11 coal remaining - implement automated refueling
- Electrical network: All production buildings remain properly powered

### Throughput observations
- Iron ore production: 42/min (limited by full chest)
- Water/steam production: ~194/min (stable)
- Gear production: 0 (resource supply issue)
